00024 // 10k of RAM
00026 #define MEMORY_SIZE 10240

00031 #define SETUP_SOFT_INT() do{     \
00032    P2DIR |=  (1 << 5);           \
00033    P2SEL |=  (1 << 5);           \
00034    P2IES &= ~(1 << 5);           \
00035    P2IE  |=  (1 << 5);           \
00036 }while(0)
00037 
00038 #define DISABLE_SOFT_INT() P2IFG &= ~(1 << 5)
00039 #define DO_SOFT_INT()      P2IFG |=  (1 << 5)
00040 
00041 // not necessary for msp430
00042 #define WAIT_FOR_ASYNC_UPDATE()

00044 // stack pointer type
00045 typedef uint16_t stackval_t;
00046 
00047 // size of the SR -- used for mos_(enable|disable)_ints();
00048 typedef uint16_t handle_t;

00050 // minimum stack size

00053 #define ENABLE_INTS() eint()
00054 #define DISABLE_INTS() dint()

00056 #define PLAT_INIT()

00058 #define PRE_KERNEL_SLEEP()
00059 #define POST_KERNEL_SLEEP()
00060 
00061 // turn off TimerA
00062 #define DISABLE_TSLICE_TIMER() TACTL &= ~(MC_3)
00063 // start TimerA
00064 #define ENABLE_TSLICE_TIMER() TACTL |= MC_1
00065 
00066 #define TSLICE_TIMER_VALUE (TAR)
00067 // make sure the interrupt was triggered
00068 // because of a capture
00069 #define TSLICE_TIMER_EXPIRED (TAIV & 0x02)
00070 
00071 #define SET_TSLICE_TIMER_VALUE(value) TAR = value
00072 #define SET_TSLICE_OCR_VALUE(value) TACCR0 = TACCR1 = value
00073 
00074 // turn off TimerB
00075 #define DISABLE_SLEEP_TIMER() TBCTL &= ~(MC_3)
00076 // start TimerB
00077 #define ENABLE_SLEEP_TIMER() TBCTL |= MC_1
00078 #define SET_SLEEP_TIMER_VALUE(time) TBR = time
00079 #define SET_SLEEP_OCR_VALUE(value) TBCCR0 = TBCCR1 = value
00080 // make sure the interrupt was triggered
00081 // because of a capture
00082 #define SLEEP_TIMER_EXPIRED (TBIV & 0x02)
00083 
00084 // msp430 doesn't need to do anything special
00085 // to enable low power modes
00086 #define ENABLE_SLEEP()
00087 #define ENABLE_IDLE()
00088 
00089 // set low power mode bits in the SR to sleep
00090 #define SLEEP() _BIS_SR(LPM3_bits)
00091 #define IDLE() _BIS_SR(LPM0_bits)
00092

00094 #define SLEEP_INT_HEADER()  interrupt (TIMERB1_VECTOR) sleep_wake_int()
00095 #define TSLICE_INT_HEADER() interrupt (TIMERA1_VECTOR) tslice_sig_int()

00119 #define GET_SP(sp) {            \
00120       asm volatile(             \
00121          "mov.w r1, %0\n\t"     \
00122          :"=r" (sp) : );        \
00123          }
